SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PersonalGoalCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PersonalGoalCard
public class PersonalGoalCard extends Object
The PersonalGoalCard class represents a personal goal card in the game. It extends the Listenable class and provides methods to calculate points and retrieve information about the card.
